loot_loading_fail: Loading failed, please try again later
redeem_button_store_disabled: Please try again once the store has been re-enabled
loot_error_craft_failed_description: Crafting may have failed for this item - please reload the Loot tab to see if your materials were consumed and if crafting was successful.  If not, please try crafting the item again.  If you continue to see this error message, please try again later; there may be issues with the service.
loot_error_craft_timeout_description: Crafting may have timed out for this item - please reload the Loot tab to see if your materials were consumed and if crafting was successful.  If not, please try crafting the item again.  If you continue to see this error message, please try again later; there may be issues with the service.
loot_error_redeem_failed_description: You drop in a shard, expecting a magical (and totally scientific) transformation... but instead your shard pops back out. Please try restarting your client. If you continue to see this message please try again later; there may be issues with the service.
loot_error_redeem_timeout_description: You hit the Hextech unit with your wrench but nothing happens. Please try restarting your client. If you continue to see this message please try again later; there may be issues with the service.
loot_error_reward_claim_failed_descripti: Sorry, we ran into a problem claiming your reward. Please leave the Loot tab and come back to try again. If you continue to see this message, please wait until later to try again while we resolve the service issue.
loot_error_disenchant_failed_description: Your Hextech unit sputters to a stop. You look inside; instead of delicious essence you find the same item you put in! Please try restarting your client. If you continue to see this message please try again later; there may be issues with the service.
loot_error_not_ready_description: Unable to retrieve some loot item data. Items may appear without icons or names. If so, please try restarting your client.
loot_redeem_notification_body: Has been permanently added to your inventory
loot_redeem_notification_rental_body: Has been added to your inventory for {{rentalPeriodLoc}}

loot_tooltip_first_visit_MYTHIC_ESSENCE: Your Gemstone balance has moved here! Click here to see the new Mythic Shop.
loot_mythic_modal_chest_subtitle: Get Mythic Essence from leveling, Loot, events, and more sources to come.
loot_mythic_modal_skin_subtitle: Exchange Mythic Essence for Mythic Skins, rare Prestige Skins, and more in the new Mythic Shop.
loot_mythic_modal_clock_title: DISCOVER A ROTATING INVENTORY OF SURPRISES
loot_mythic_modal_clock_subtitle: Every month, the Mythic Shop restocks with fresh content. Check back to see what’s newly available.
loot_tooltip_ALREADY_OWNED: You already own this item! Re-roll or disenchant it.
loot_tooltip_RENTED: You are currently renting this item!
loot_tooltip_CHAMPION_NOT_OWNED: You do not own the required champion.
loot_invalid_action_missing_ingredients: Add the correct ingredients to perform this action.
loot_upgrade_owned_warn_body: You've already unlocked this item. You may upgrade, but you won't be able to unlock it again!
loot_description_CURRENCY_champion: Material used to upgrade Champion Shards
loot_description_lol_blue_essence: Material used to upgrade Champion Shards
loot_description_CURRENCY_cosmetic: Material used to upgrade Cosmetic Shards
loot_description_MATERIAL_key:
Opens locked Chests.

Collect 3 Key Fragments to create a Key. Play games to earn key fragments over time. Keys can also be purchased in the store.
loot_description_MATERIAL_key_fragment:
Collect 3 to create a Key.

Play games to earn key fragments over time.
loot_description_MATERIAL_rare: Rare crafting item. Can be forged into a loot exclusive
loot_description_CHAMPION_TOKEN_6: Used to advance the Mastery level of a specific champion. Acquired by grading S- or above on a level 5 Mastery champion.
loot_description_CHAMPION_TOKEN_7: Used to advance the Mastery level of a specific champion. Acquired by grading S or above on a level 6 Mastery champion.
loot_description_CHEST_mystery_champion_: Used to forge a random champion.
loot_description_CHEST_9: A capsule containing champion shards and sometimes bonus goodies. No key required! Granted for leveling up.

loot_description_CHEST_91: Contains a guaranteed Legacy skin shard and a 50% chance to get a bonus drop. If your orb triggers a bonus drop, you’ll have a chance to get either a random amount of Order Tokens, twenty Mythic Essence, or the loot-exclusive Hextech Annie skin shard.
loot_description_CHEST_92: Contains a guaranteed Legacy skin shard and a 50% chance to get a bonus drop. If your orb triggers a bonus drop, you’ll have a chance to get either a random amount of Chaos Tokens, twenty Mythic Essence, or the loot-exclusive Soulstealer Vayne skin shard.
loot_description_MATERIAL_89: A manifestation of order’s will, born from light. Can be forged into Order-exclusive loot during the VS. Event.  Tokens expire from inventory on 7/24/17 23:59 PT.
loot_description_MATERIAL_90: A manifestation of chaos’s will, born from darkness. Can be redeemed for exclusive loot during the VS. Event.  Tokens expire from inventory on 7/24/17 23:59 PT.
loot_description_MATERIAL_95: Commemorates the VS. victor by 7/4/17 23:59 PT.
loot_description_CHEST_96: A keyless capsule containing key fragments, champ shards, and skins exclusive to Honor.
loot_description_CHEST_97: A keyless capsule containing key fragments, champ shards, and skins exclusive to Honor.
loot_description_CHEST_98: A keyless capsule containing key fragments, champ shards, and skins exclusive to Honor.
loot_description_CHEST_99: For epic crafting. Contains three skin shards, with one guaranteed to be Epic or higher. Also contains an increased chance for Mythic Essence. No key required.
loot_description_MATERIAL_105: Awarded for completing missions from Omega Squad operatives. Combine all five to craft the Omega Squad Veteran Icon. Tokens expire from inventory on 08/21/17 23:59 PT.
loot_description_CHEST_106: A common orb sought by battle bosses everywhere. Available until 8/24/17 23:59 PT.
loot_description_CHEST_107: Rarer than a Good Orb. Just look at the shooting star on this thing! Available until 8/24/17 23:59 PT.
loot_description_CHEST_108: The best of the orbs. Available until 8/24/17 23:59 PT.
loot_description_MATERIAL_112: Can be redeemed for exclusive loot during Arcade Boss World. Tickets expire from inventory on 9/11/17 23:59 PT.
loot_description_MATERIAL_113: Granted for completing missions from the Invasion game mode. Combine them to craft a Hextech Mystery Champion Permanent and the New Horizon Ward. Tokens expire from inventory on October 16 23:59 PT.
loot_description_MATERIAL_122: Can be redeemed for exclusive loot during the 2017 World Championship. Worlds Tokens expire from inventory on December 4 23:59 PT.
loot_description_CHEST_114: Used to forge a random champion permanent.

loot_description_CHEST_189: Get a guaranteed skin shard and at least 50 Orange Essence with a chance to contain bonuses like a PROJECT Skin Orb or Emote Permanent. Mythic Essence and Hextech Exclusive Skin Shard drop rate increased by 50%.
loot_description_CHEST_190: Contains a skin shard for a random PROJECT skin. Does not include PROJECT: Vayne, PROJECT: Vi, or PROJECT: Jhin.
loot_description_CHEST_191: Get three skin shards, all guaranteed to be 975 RP tier or higher, and bonus Orange Essence (150 or higher). Also includes a 50% increased chance for Mythic Essence and Hextech Exclusive Skin Shards. No key required.
loot_description_CHEST_205: Get three or more skin shards, with one guaranteed to be Epic or higher,and bonus Orange Essence. Any 520 or 750 tier shard drops will drop a bonus 520 tier skin shard! Also includes a 50% increased chance for Mythic Essence and loot-exclusive skin shards. No key required.

loot_chest_purchase_load_failed_body: Retrieving loot deals from the store failed. Please try again later.
loot_purchase_chest_hover_need_rp_descri: You need more RP to unlock this item
loot_purchase_chest_option_1_description: What's in the box? Acquire random Champion, Skin, Ward Skin, Summoner Icon, and Mythic Essence crafting components.
Premium Chests frequently drop permanents. This bundle also includes one bonus Gemstone! Limited time only!
loot_purchase_chest_confirmation_1_descr:
- 10 Hextech Chests
- 10 Hextech Keys
- 1 Bonus Chest & Key

- 10 Premium Chests
- 10 Hextech Keys
- 1 Mythic Essence
loot_purchase_chest_confirmation_2_descr:
- 5 Hextech Chests
- 5 Hextech Keys
- 50 Orange Essence

- 5 Premium Chests
- 5 Hextech Keys
- 50 Orange Essence
loot_purchase_confirm_no_refunds: I have read the Terms of Purchase and agree to them.
loot_recipebook_tooltip_upgrade_body_2: + X Essence of that item type
loot_recipebook_tooltip_reroll_subtitle: Re-rolls loot into a new item of the same type
loot_recipebook_tooltip_reroll_body_1: 3 Items or Item Shards of the same type
loot_recipebook_tooltip_reroll_body_2: 1 Item of that type which you do not own
loot_recipebook_tooltip_disenchant_subti: Destroys and converts loot into Essence
loot_recipebook_tooltip_disenchant_body_: X Essence of that item type
loot_purchase_chests_success_message: Your item has been successfully unlocked.
loot_purchase_chests_failure_message: Something went wrong with the store. We're working to fix it, please try again later.
loot_purchase_chests_limit_message: Daily purchase limit reached for this item.
loot_cta_left_description: Find Keys from matchmade games. Earn Chests when anyone in your premade party ranks S, up to 4 per month, but only one per champion per season.
loot_cta_center_description: Open Chests to find Shards of champions, skins, ward skins, and more.
loot_cta_right_description: Upgrade Shards into unlocked content, redeem them for a trial period, or re-roll them into other loot.
loot_cta2_center_description: You've been awarded a special Chest with extra loot to try out the system. It includes:
loot_cta2_center_description2: We’ve also given you enough Essence to permanently unlock one of them right now by clicking on it in the Loot Inventory and selecting Upgrade.
loot_disenchant_description: will be added to your resources
loot_help_modal_text_description_intro: Quick start guide to the Hextech Crafting system
loot_help_modal_text_description_essence: Use essence to upgrade shards into permanent content. Orange essence is used on cosmetic items, such as skins, summoner icons, and emotes. Blue essence is used on champions and champion mastery tokens. Rare gemstones are rarely dropped from chests, and are used to forge exclusive Hextech Crafting content.

Use Essence to upgrade shards into permanent content. Orange Essence is used on cosmetic items, such as skins, summoner icons, and emotes. Blue Essence is used on champions and champion mastery tokens. Mythic Essence can be forged into a variety of rare items, which rotate periodically.
loot_help_modal_text_description_chest: Earn chests by achieving high grades in champion mastery, or purchase them from the store. Chests can drop all sorts of content, including legacy skins.
loot_help_modal_text_description_rarity: Gem icons denote the rarity of content. There are currently four tiers of rarity.
loot_help_modal_text_description_reroll: Reroll three items of the same type to obtain a random, unowned permanent item of the same type. This will destroy the three items used in the reroll process.
loot_help_modal_text_description_upgrade: Spend essence to turn your shards into permanent content. Permanent content can be immediately redeemed and used.
loot_help_modal_text_description_forge: Forge recipes are used to create specialized content out of materials. Turn gemstones into exclusive Hextech skins, key fragments into keys, tokens into champion mastery levels, and more to come.
loot_help_modal_text_description_forge_m: Forge recipes are used to create specialized content out of materials. Turn Mythic Essence into exclusive skins (and more to come).
loot_help_modal_text_description_rental: Shards can be consumed to unlock a rental version of that piece of content, with a seven day duration. The shard is destroyed in the process.
loot_help_modal_text_description_disench: Shards can be disenchanted into the type of essence used to upgrade them. Champions are disenchanted into Blue Essence. Skins, summoner icons, ward skins, and emotes are disenchanted into Orange Essence.
loot_open_disabled_unfilled_slots_toolti: Looks like you're missing some components
loot_navigation_tooltip_level_restricted: Reach summoner level {{requiredLevel}} to unlock Loot!
loot_navigation_tooltip_disabled: Loot is temporarily disabled. Please check the service status for more information.
loot_recipe_menu_subtitle_material_89: Versus tokens will expire and will no longer be obtainable after 7/24/17 at 23:59 PT
loot_recipe_menu_subtitle_material_90: Versus tokens will expire and will no longer be obtainable after 7/24/17 at 23:59 PT
loot_recipe_menu_subtitle_material_rare: Combine gemstones to unlock these rare rewards.
loot_recipe_menu_subtitle_material_112: Welcome to the prize counter. Redeem your tickets here until 9/11/17 23:59 PT
loot_recipe_menu_subtitle_material_113: Transform your Starlight Tokens here until 10/16/17 23:59 PT
loot_recipe_menu_subtitle_material_122: Forge your Worlds Tokens into event-only orbs, icons, borders, and more.
loot_recipe_menu_subtitle_material_192: Forge your PROJECT Tokens into event-only orbs, icons, borders and more. PROJECT Tokens expire from inventory on January 8, 2018 at 11:59 p.m. PT.
loot_recipe_menu_subtitle_material_217: Forge your Golden Revel Token into Golden Lunar Revel Chromas.
loot_recipe_menu_subtitle_material_218: Forge your Revel Tokens into Lunar Revel orbs, icons, borders and more. Revel Tokens expire from inventory on March 12, 2018 at 11:59 p.m. PT.
loot_milestones_repeating_tooltip: This track loops! Make progress and claim rewards to complete the loop. Progress made past the loop is still tracked.
loot_milestones_disabled_message_body: Due to a service outage, we can't open this item right now. Please try again later.
loot_odds_error_fail_to_load_description: Sorry, we were unable to retrieve loot item data. If this persists, please try restarting the League Client.
loot_odds_droprates_modal_legal_disclaim: Information about the probabilities relating to the content of your purchase
loot_odds_droprates_modal_additional_gua: Also contains one of the following:
loot_odds_droprates_modal_chance_subtitl: Chance to contain any of the following:
loot_odds_bad_luck_protection_descriptio: No bad luck for you. For certain rewards, opening a certain number of items without a specific reward will guarantee that reward on the next item. The reward and threshold are different for every item.
loot_odds_no_duplicates_description: One or more rewards will not drop an item you already own. Can drop an item one level higher if the item has tiers. All unowned items have a higher chance to drop.
LOOTTABLE_CHEST_champion_mastery_1: Skin Shard, Champion Shard, Ward Skin Shard, or Summoner Icon
LOOTTABLE_CHEST_champion_mastery_2_long: Used to unlock loot-exclusive skins, wards, and more
LOOTTABLE_chest_generic_3_long: Reveals a random ward skin shard.
LOOTTABLE_chest_generic_4_long:
Includes:
- Hextech Annie
- Soulstealer Vayne
- Dreadnova Darius
- Lancer Zero Hecarim
- *New Loot Exclusive* Hextech Alistar
- Hextech Ward
LOOTBUNDLE_icon_cosmetic_1_long: Flair for you to wear whenever you log in.
LOOTTABLE_chest_88_1_long: Reveals an SKT, SSW, TPA, Fnatic, or Challenger skin shard, which are all Legacy.
LOOTTABLE_chest_99_1_long: Guaranteed to be an Epic skin or higher.
LOOTTABLE_chest_99_2_long: Could contain any skin tier. The skin of your dreams just might be in here.
LOOTBUNDLE_2_long: Used to unlock loot-exclusive skins, wards, and more
LOOTTABLE_chest_54_long: Reveals a random Legacy skin shard.
LOOTTABLE_chest_106_2_long: Reveals a random ward skin shard.
LOOTTABLE_chest_106_3_long: Flair for you to wear whenever you log in.
LOOTTABLE_chest_123_124_long: Reveals a random Hextech Exclusive skin shard.
LOOTTABLE_chest_124_0_long: Reveals a random Legacy skin shard.
CHEST_106_long: A common orb sought by battle bosses everywhere. Available until 8/24/17 23:59 PT.
CHEST_107_long: Greater than a Good Orb. Just look at the shooting star on this thing! Available until 8/24/17 23:59 PT.
CHEST_108_long: The most powerful orb of all time and space and eternity, blessed by the 8-bit Baron himself. Available until 8/24/17 23:59 PT.
CHEST_123_long: Get a guaranteed skin shard. This orb can also drop bonus loot; if you score, say it was pure skill.
CHEST_124_long: The legends are true: This one guarantees you a Legacy skin shard. This orb can also drop bonus loot.
CHAMPION_SKIN_RENTAL_120007_long: Charge down the wicked when you forge this loot-exclusive skin shard.
CHAMPION_SKIN_RENTAL_67010_long: Condemn the darkest souls when you forge this loot-exclusive skin shard.
CHAMPION_SKIN_RENTAL_122014_long: Decimate the cosmos when you forge this loot-exclusive skin shard.
CHAMPION_SKIN_RENTAL_1010_long: Unleash mechanical mayhem when you forge this loot-exclusive skin shard.
CHAMPION_SKIN_15009_long: This limited time, loot-exclusive skin can drop as one of the three skin shards, or as a bonus permanent.
CHEST_187_long: Used to forge a random emote.
CHEST_188_long:
Contains: One Champion Shard (or two lower-tier Champion Shards)
Chance to contain: PROJECT Champion Orb
CHEST_189_long:
Contains: One skin shard, 50 Orange Essence
Chance to contain: PROJECT Skin Orb, Emote Permanent, extra Orange Essence, Mythic Essence, or Hextech Exclusive Skin Shard
CHEST_190_long: Contains a skin shard for a random PROJECT skin. Does not include PROJECT: Vayne, PROJECT: Vi, or PROJECT: Jhin.
CHEST_191_long:
Contains: Three skin shards, all guaranteed to be 975 or higher each, 150 Orange Essence

Chance to contain: 10-30 Mythic Essence
LOOTTABLE_chest_216_long: Contains a skin shard for a random Revel skin. Does not include Lunar Empress Lux, Lunar Guardian Nasus, or Lunar Guardian Warwick
LOOTTABLE_CHEST_205_1_long: Skin shard for an Epic (1350 RP) skin or higher.
LOOTTABLE_CHEST_205_2_long: Skin shard for a 520 RP skin or higher.
LOOTTABLE_CHEST_champion_mastery_3_long: Used to unlock loot-exclusive skins, wards, and more
loot_mass_disenchant_auto_select_descrip: Owned and duplicate shards will be disenchanted
loot_mass_disenchant_limit$html: You may only disenchant {{disenchantLimit}} shards at a time
loot_mass_disenchant_empty_state_descrip: You don't have any owned or duplicate shards for us to convert into essence.
loot_mass_disenchant_empty_state_hint: Try opening some chests or capsules to get more!
loot_mass_disenchant_attention_tooltip_d: Click the icon to multi-disenchant owned and duplicate shards in one go.
